rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.title: Anopheles farauti No.3, a hitherto unrecognized biological species of mosquito within the taxon A.farauti Laveran (Diptera:Culicidae)
rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.description: A hitherto unrecognized mosquito species, Anopheles farauti No. 3 has been found in Australia. This species occurs in sympatry with both A. farauti No. 1 and A. farauti No. 2 but we have found no evidence of introgression. Hybrids between A. farauti No. 3 and either A. farauti No. 1 or A. farauti No. 2 were found to be sterile.
rdsi.pacelf.phase3:document.journal: Transactions of the Royal Society of Tropcial Medicine and Hygiene
